questions.question: Photosynthesis uses light energy to produce which of the following in cells:

choices.answer: Organic (carbon) compounds such as carbon dioxide
Organic (carbon) compounds such as glucose
Inorganic compounds such as carbon dioxide
Inorganic compounds such as glucose

questions.question: Which of the following is true regarding visible light?

choices.answer: It has a range of wavelengths
It is composed of only red, green and blue wavelengths
All colors have the same wavelength
Visible light is not a wave and so has no wavelength

questions.question: Which of the following best describes the wavelengths of light?

choices.answer: Green has the shortest wavelength, red has the longest
Red has the shortest wavelength, green has the longest
Red has the shortest wavelength, violet has the longest
Violet has the shortest wavelength, red has the longest

questions.question: Chlorophyll absorbs which of the following wavelengths most effectively?

choices.answer: Red and Green light
Red light only
Red and Blue light
Blue and Green light
Chloroplasts of plant and animal cells
Mitochondria of plant and animal cells
Chloroplasts of plant cells only
Mitochondria of plant only

questions.question: During the first stage of photosynthesis, photolysis, which of the following takes place?

choices.answer: Light is used to split water into oxygen and hydrogen ions
Light is used to form water from oxygen and hydrogen ions
Heat is used to split water into oxygen and hydrogen ions
Heat is used to form water from oxygen and hydrogen ions

questions.question: After photolysis, which of the following takes place?

choices.answer: Energy is used to produce carbohydrates using O<sub>2</sub> and H+
Light is used to produce carbohydrates using CO<sub>2</sub> and H+
Energy is used to produce carbohydrates using CO<sub>2</sub> and H+
Light is used to produce carbohydrates using O<sub>2</sub> and H+

questions.question: Which of the following is NOT a limiting factor on the rate of photosynthesis?

choices.answer: Temperature
Light Intensity
Carbon dioxide concentration
Oxygen concentration

questions.question: Look at the action and absorption spectra below.  What does the action spectra measure?

choices.answer: Overall rate of photosynthesis at each wavelength of light
Wavelengths of light absorbed by each pigment
Wavelengths of light reflected by each pigment
How many different pigments are present

questions.question: There is a strong correlation between the action and absorption spectra showing what?

choices.answer: Peaks in the blue + green regions, trough in the red region
Peaks in the green + red regions, trough in the blue region
Peak in the blue region, troughs in the green + red regions
Peaks in the blue + red regions, trough in the green region
